title: Needed to patch the game twice, because it was 7.14 again....
body:
Hi,

it's in the middle of the night on a weekend and I patched my client now twice, because it got set back to 7.14 for no reason.
Maybe you want to fix issues like that.

replies.body: Are you storing any game files externally?  It sounds like something is causing your game files to only store temporarily if it keeps setting you back.  I'd suggest going through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is being allowed.  Make sure that your game files are also being saved through your primary internal drive as well!
